article_title: Tavenner's Low-Profile CMS Tenure Was All Politics

article_metadata.description: Friday's news that Marilyn Tavenner would step down as administrator of the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services in February first left me feeling ambivalent. Then I actually read the letter she sent to CMS staff, as well as the  letter from her boss, Health and Human Services Secretary Sylvia [...]
article_metadata.author: Neil Versel
